title: hecxtech annie!
body:
OMG i so cant believe i got hextech annie i had the chest sittin there 4 WEEKS till i was able to get 3 key shards!!!!
i also got a gem with it an i had heaps of skins in loot so i traded them 4 essence an HEY PRESTO HEXTECH ANNIE i almost died of a heartattack!!!! LOL
just wanna say how lucky am!!! im gonna main her 4 DAYS!!!!!!
an just wanna say a shout out to all the RIOT staff TY 4 the skin an love ur work!!!!
THANK U SO MUCH 4 THE ANNIE SKIN!!!!!

replies.body: Not bad since i watched a youtube open 500$ chests to get the ten gems
